title: statement from LiverDoc
selftext: statement from LiverDoc aka Dr Cyriac Abb Philips regarding his recent account ban as a result of litigation filed by Himalaya Drug company. His studies and presentations on drug induced liver injuries caused by ayurvedic/homeopathic "medicines" was an eye-opener. He was often abused both online and in real life by government and pseudoscience pedalers. It's disheartened to see a citizen is abused for exercising article 15-AH.
